column2: [blacksmith.getDynName] is waiting, as you enter is blacksmith store. He looks at you, welcoming. "What do you wish to make this time around?"
Now is not the best time...
Well it seems a weapon is what you want, now tell me, what specifics do you desire
A sword will bring me glory!
An axe will allow me to slice and dice!
The distance a spear provides shall be my victory!
